text: 08 Nov 2024 6 New Romances for Fans of Atonement If you were moved by the emotional depth and tragic beauty of Atonement, these six new romance novels are sure to captivate you. Blending love, longing, and the powerful impact of life’s choices, these stories offer richly drawn characters and heartrending narratives. Prepare for unforgettable journeys into passion, redemption, and the complexity of the human heart—perfect for fans seeking another sweeping, bittersweet romance. Axle (WAR BROTHERS MC Book 1) by Bianca Lee Ward Release Date: October 29 2024 She’s a wager, a game. I’ll pretend she’s mine. Such a pretty lie. I’m the guy Elena should stay away from, but my MC brother bets I can’t make her fall in love with me. With my flirty charm, she won’t be able to resist, but I let my guard down and she becomes my ride or die. Which means I’ve got to make sure Elena never finds out about our bet. Aria had torn down the walls I’d spent years building leaving me raw and exposed. Powerless to the promise of a future I never thought existed. Buy on Amazon Protecting Wren (SEAL of Protection: Alliance Book 2) by Susan Stoker Release Date: November 5 2024 She’s no stranger to dangerous situations, but she’ll never make it out of this one alive without the help of her Navy SEAL. Buy on Amazon Rescuing Sophia (CHARLIE Team: Guardian Hostage Rescue Specialists Book 5) by Ellie Masters Release Date: October 29 2024 Rescuing Sophia is a heart-pounding ride of suspense, passion, and impossible choices. If you crave protective alpha males, fierce heroines, and sizzling romance woven into high-stakes action, Rescuing Sophia is for you. html:
08 Nov 2024

6 New Romances for Fans of Atonement

If you were moved by the emotional depth and tragic beauty of Atonement, these six new romance novels are sure to captivate you. Blending love, longing, and the powerful impact of life’s choices, these stories offer richly drawn characters and heartrending narratives. Prepare for unforgettable journeys into passion, redemption, and the complexity of the human heart—perfect for fans seeking another sweeping, bittersweet romance.

Axle (WAR BROTHERS MC Book 1)

by Bianca Lee Ward

Release Date: October 29 2024

She’s a wager, a game. I’ll pretend she’s mine. Such a pretty lie. I’m the guy Elena should stay away from, but my MC brother bets I can’t make her fall in love with me. With my flirty charm, she won’t be able to resist, but I let my guard down and she becomes my ride or die. Which means I’ve got to make sure Elena never finds out about our bet.

Buy on Amazon

Smith (Silver Team Book 3)

by Riley Edwards

Release Date: November 1 2024

Our no-strings-attached good time had turned into something more. Aria had torn down the walls I’d spent years building leaving me raw and exposed. Powerless to the promise of a future I never thought existed.

Buy on Amazon

Protecting Wren (SEAL of Protection: Alliance Book 2)

by Susan Stoker

Release Date: November 5 2024

She’s no stranger to dangerous situations, but she’ll never make it out of this one alive without the help of her Navy SEAL.

Buy on Amazon

Rescuing Sophia (CHARLIE Team: Guardian Hostage Rescue Specialists Book 5)

by Ellie Masters

Release Date: October 29 2024

Rescuing Sophia is a heart-pounding ride of suspense, passion, and impossible choices. If you crave protective alpha males, fierce heroines, and sizzling romance woven into high-stakes action, Rescuing Sophia is for you.

Buy on Amazon

Walton (The K9 Files Book 26)

by Dale Mayer

Release Date: November 5 2024

Finding out the guests are not ordinary hunters—and the dog is not an ordinary dog—causes conflict from the first meet. And goes steadily downhill. When the dog’s owner turns up dead, all hell breaks loose. It’s all Walton can do to keep the two—no make that three—of them safe …

Buy on Amazon

Elliot (Guardian Defenders Book 10)

by Kris Michaels

Release Date: October 29 2024

When bullets, bombs, and a determined killer take aim at his charge, Elliot will do anything to save Maya’s life. Even if saving her means giving up his own.

Buy on Amazon
